title: Newcastle University hopes to improve sepsis treatment nationwide
description: Sepsis is treated by antibiotics but using the medication too much can lead to deadly superbugs.
content:
Researchers are attempting to find out whether a new method of treating sepsis could reduce the risk of developing superbugs.
Sepsis is a life-threatening condition which occurs when the immune system overreacts to an infection and can cause damage t... [1890 chars]

title: Thomas Frank hails Tottenham’s fighting spirit as Brighton blow two-goal lead
description: Jan Paul van Hecke’s late own goal handed Tottenham a 2-2 draw as Brighton let a 2-0 lead slip through their fingers
content: Familiar failings from Tottenham, proof that a change of management cannot immediately cure previous ills. Though where last season in the Premier League, there was rarely anything other than surrender, there is a fighting spirit within Thomas Frank’... [4197 chars]

title: Graham Potter under serious threat of West Ham sack after Crystal Palace defeat
description: Graham Potter is facing the sack after West Ham’s dismal start to the season continued with a 2-1 defeat at home by Crystal Palace
content:
Graham Potter is facing the sack after West Ham’s dismal start to the season continued with a 2-1 defeat at home by Crystal Palace.

title: Man armed with gun and knife detained at Charlie Kirk memorial service venue
description: US Secret Service in Phoenix says man said he was law enforcement and there to provide private security
content: A man armed with a gun and a knife was detained Saturday at State Farm Stadium near Phoenix before Charlie Kirk’s memorial service at that venue on Sunday – with authorities accusing him of brandishing inactive law enforcement credentials and lacking... [2228 chars]

title: India warns new US H-1B visa fee will have 'humanitarian consequences'
description: Donald Trump has said those applying for H-1B visas will have to pay $100,000, roughly 60 times the current fee, starting Sunday.
content:
The Indian government has said a new $100,000 (£74,000) fee for applicants seeking US skilled worker visas will have "humanitarian consequences".
President Donald Trump on Friday ordered the new fee for H-1B visa applications, which is more than 60 t... [3472 chars]
